work.name: JPMorgan Chase Bank
highlights: Operate within a strict risk framework to minimize liability to clients and the firm.
Maintain a high level understanding of products, regulations, services, and systems.
Training new team member’s on the firm’s platforms and offer support in edge cases.

work.name: Sonder
highlights: Directing the daily operations and logistics of the team to fulfill stakeholder needs across across 27 multi-unit properties in 7 Boston neighborhoods.
Presented cost effective solutions with highest increase in net promoter following experimental evaluations of guest experience.

work.name: Emmanuel College Neuroscience Department
work.position: Research Assistant for Melanie P. Leussis PhD
highlights: Comparatively analyzing effect of physical vs digital textbooks on learning outcomes.
Data collection, construction, and maintenance of project database following review of relevant journal literature.

work.name: Emmanuel College Economics Department
work.position: Research Assistant for Kelly Basile PhD
highlights: Ran participants through experimental interviews and surveys.
Transcription, validation, coding, and analysis of data from interviews and surveys.
Drafting and presentation of research reports for publication and conferences.
Identified relationship between parenting styles and attitudes toward technology.
